111.content: Both of the ninja girls, Sakura and Ino wanted to have a rematch for a pretty long time and today they were finally going to do it. They met in an open field pretty far away from the village. "I have waited for this battle for quite a time... I'm not going to lose!", Sakura said as soon as they made eye contact. Ino nodded and said:"Me too... Very well, let's get this started!" and without wasting any more time, the ninjas engaged into battle. They both fought with all their power and skill and the fight went on for several minutes. No matter how hard they tried, neither Sakura nor Ino managed to really hurt their opponent. They were just as strong and after another 20 minutes, both of them were really exhausted and almost too tired to continue fighting. The sun was burning mercylessly and the ninja girls were now soaked in their sweat from the fight and the extreme heat. It was then when they noticed a smell... It was a very cheesy and slightly sour smell, it smelled like... feet! Ino, still gasping for air, said:"I think this battle is going nowhere, maybe whe should... *sniff* Ugh, Sakura, is that putrid smell coming from your feet?" Sakura blushed and responded angryly:"Uhm... yeah, do you expect my feet to smell like roses after such a long battle? Besides, I think most of that smell is emitted by YOUR feet, Ino, just look how sweaty your toes are!" Ino looked down and was shocked, her toes really were extremely sweaty and the smell of her feet was pretty strong... but she was sure that Sakuras feet would be worse... Suddenly, she got an idea! "Hey, Sakura! I know a less exhausting way to continue our fight... But it won't be pleasant." "The stench of your feet is not pleasant, haha! But to be fair, my feet smell horrible as well..." "That's what I want to say! We continue our battle by smelling each others feet!" "What? That's disgusting, I can smell your reeking feet from here... But actually, I think it's a good idea! Ok, let's do it!" "Haha, great, prepare to be knocked out... so, should we smell each others feet or the footwear?"
111.title: Feet or footwear?

1111.content: "Haha, good choice, that way I will win even faster!", Ino laughed. "Let's see about that..." The ninja girls walked towards each other, sat on the ground and took their boots off. Ino thought that Sakuras feet looked really beautiful, but she never noticed that they were this large... and sweaty. "Hehe, yes, take a good look at them... Soon, you will know how it feels like to have them on your face! Oh, by the way... I haven't washed my feet in quite some time and trained a few hours every day... Just that you know it..." "Urks, your feet sure smell like that... that's not fair... but how about mine?" Ino presented her own sweaty soles to Sakura while wiggeling her toes. Sakura took a curious whiff and grimaced. "Yuck, your feet really reek as well... what a shame, your feet look really cute... But still, you have no chance!" Ino kept staring at Sakuras big, smelly feet. They were still sweating heavily, a few drops were dripping on the ground... "Well... I'm not sure if we should do this-" "Hey, it was your idea! Take a load of these..." Sakura interrupted here and pushed her warm, sweaty feet against Ino's unprepared face. Ino was amazad how soft and smooth Sakuras feet were... 11122.content:
Sakura, who had walked into the fight confident of her triumph, saw victory farther and farther by each new breath she took. Ino's boot was drenched in sweat, with a few drops of hot, salty and above all, dangerously smelly, perspiration falling over Sakura's face. As she coughed, she felt more warm, vinegary, rancid air passing from her adversary's shoe into her nostrils, intoxicating her body, polluting her lungs and filling her head with a feeling of dizziness, emptiness and despair. She could only watch as her hands weakened and eventually fell to either side of her attractive legs.

The smell of Sakura's boot seemed to be affecting Ino likewise, but either due to the fact that hours of work in a flower shop had devitalized her sense of smell, or because her feet were simply smellier that Sakura's, she kept on pressing the foul-smelling shoe against the young ninja's face. Sakura was starting to panic, as defeat was more than certain. Her boot eventually dropped half a metre from Ino, who continued to attack Sakura with her smelly chemical weapon. She took a particularly strong whiff of Ino's foot smell, trying to get whatever precious air there still was around her. It was a fatal mistake. Sakura felt her body overrun by toxins, as if she had been bit by a hundred venomous snakes. Her lungs were tired from coughing and her brain barely functioning.

Seeing her victim starting to fall under the toll of her foot sweat, Ino carried out the coup de grâce. She quickly unzip her other boot and, giving less than a second for Sakura to react, compressed both of her feet, swimming in sweat and smell, over her old enemy's head. Sakura involuntarily breathed once again and it was over. Her back dropped toward the floor as her head seemingly spun in an uncontrolled manner, her eyes closed slowly and her lips mumbled something incomprehensible. The last thing she could see was Ino evil grin, before everything went black and her conscience departed to the Sleepy Land.

Ino shook her fist over her head in triumph. She had passed most of her life living in Sakura's shadow, but now she had her everyday adversary at her mercy! She could already write a list of long things to do with Sakura, from having her be Ino's personal footslave for life to have her smell Ino's feet in public, the biggest humiliation a ninja could endure. But before that, she headed over to a small basin filled with water and washed her face to clean the little drops of Sakura's foot sweat. Even after cleaning, Ino could still tell that she smelled like ninja boots. As she looked into the water in the recipient a strange, devilish idea came to her mind.
"An hypnotic jutsu! Of course!"

Before leaving the room, Ino cared to assemble both of Sakura's shoes and, transporting them as far from her nose as possible, locked it in a storeroom adjacent to the hall. Afterwards, she bounded the other female ninja's hand with a tight knot in a rope she had found lying around a few days before. Finally, she exited the room and, with an excited dexterity, open a secret compartment in the house. It was there that she kept the magic writings Tsunade had once given her as a 'welcome back' gift. She browsed through the files until she found a very small one, with a carefully drawn eye in the back. Excited, she began to study so she could relinquish her revenge.

115.title: The Unfortunate Ninja

1151.content:
Ten Ten opened her eyes.
"Ugh...What happend?" She moaned.
She looks around to find herself tied up with Sakura and Ino sitting in front of her. Both of them smiled wickedly.

"Oh look Ino...she's awake!!!" Sakura said happily.

Ino nodded smiling. "Did you have a pleasant nap?" she asked."We tied you up to make you more comfortable."

Ten Ten groaned. "This is for going around saying that all the other kunoichis in the village are ugly compared to me. Isn't it?"

Both girls grinned.

"You don't think we're that petty do you?" Sakura asked.

"Yeah. We're not the type of people to hold grudges." Ino acting shocked.

"I mean what girl wouldn't want to be called ugly?" Sakura asked sarcastically.

Both girls stared at their victim coldly.

Ten Ten frowned. They're definitely upset with me, she thought. "Look I'm really sorry about what I said." She apologized."Both of you are drop dead gorgeous.Can you let me go now?"

"Uh......no!!" Sakura said. "First you have to make it up to us."

Ino nodded in agreement.

"How?" Ten Ten asked.

Both girls smiled. Clearly they had something cruel planned.

"It's actually pretty simple. We just wanted you to settle a dispute for us." Ino said.

Sakura giggled and nodded.

Ten Ten had a really bad feeling. "What type of dispute?" She asked.

Ino smiled. "Sakura and I have a bet going on about whose feet smell the worst" She said. "We want you to smell our feet and be the judge."

Ten Ten looked at her fellow kunoichi sandle covered feet and got really sick. She doubted that either of the girls feet would be smelling very good.

"Yuck that's disgusting." Ten Ten said. "I'm not smelling your feet."

"Aw isn't that cute Ino?" Sakura laughed. "She thinks she has a choice."

Both girls smiled as they moved towards their intended victim. The weapons expert gulped.

Whose foot odor does Ten Ten experience first?

1151221.content:
After about a half an hour of using Ten Ten as a footstool, Ino checks to see how her poor victim was doing. In the short amount of time Ino's feet had really worked her over. Ten Ten was coughing violently from being forced to smell Ino's foot odor and her face was soaked with footsweat.

"You might have overdone it Ino." Sakura noted giggling. "She looks really sick."

"Well I did just come off of a 6 hour shift working at the flower shop," Ino laughed. "I guess my feet aren't smelling their best. But let's ask our foot sniffer what she thinks."

Smiling, the blonde kunoichi tapped her foot against Ten Ten's cheek to get her attention. "So Ten Ten, How do my feet smell?" She asked.

All the poor weapon's master could do was cough in response.

Both of her captors laughed. "Seems she's having trouble answering." Ino said smiling to Sakura.

Sakura smiled evilly. "Maybe she hasn't had enough of your foot odor to decide what she thinks of them." She suggested. "That's probably why she's not saying anything."

Ten Ten’s eyes opened wide

Ino grinned. "Oh is that it?" She asks faking an innocent expression. "If you wanted more Ten Ten all you had to do was say so."

Giggling, Ino wiggled her toes as she slowly brought her feet towards Ten Ten’s face. Ten Ten begin shaking her head vigorous much to the delight of the other girls. Using all her concentration, the weapon’s expert tried her best to suppress her coughing.
“*CAK* *CACK* P-Please,” she begged. “No more!”

The other two girls were rolling on the floor laughing.
“So how does it smell?” Ino asked repeating her question and giving Ten Ten’s face a couple of pokes with her foot.

“A-Awful” Ten Ten whimpered. “Please stop.”

“You don’t like it?” Ino teased once again rubbing her feet against the poor kunoichi.

“No” Ten Ten said near tears now. “Please stop.”

Ino smiled. “You know, Sakura I feel kind of bad for her. Maybe we should give her a break from all that foot sniffing.”

Ten Ten looked really hopeful while Sakura looked surprised.

“Really?” Sakura asked sounding disappointed.

“Yeah.” Ino said giving her a wink.

Sakura smiled knowing her best friend was up to something. “If that you want…” She said pretending to be reluctant about it.

Ino looked down at Ten Ten. “Ok Ten Ten I’ll give you a break from all that foot sniffing if you do me one little favor.”

“A-Anything.” Ten Ten said.

Ino smiled. “Ok just kiss my feet a bit to show me how sorry you are.”

Ten Ten felt completely humiliated but she would do anything to avoid more barefoot odor. She begin repeatedly kissing Ino’s feet just to please her. Ino and Sakura watched with amusement laughing the entire time.

Finally after 5 minutes, Ino took her feet off of Ten Ten. “Ok Ten Ten, you did good. I think you deserve a break from my feet for that.”

Ten Ten looked relieved. “Thank you” She said.

Ino smiled. “But I think you need something to do in the meantime just so you won’t get bored” She said turning to her friend. “Don’t you think so Sakura?”

Sakura nodded playing her part. “Oh definitely.”

“Hmm” Ino said pretending to think. “How about you smell my sandles while you’re waiting?”

Ten Ten looked horrified. While Ino at least had to wash her feet ocasionally, she doubted that Ino ever washed her sandals “But you said…”

“Your not smelling me feet…you’re smelling my sandals silly.” Ino said grinning evilly.

Ten Ten felt like she was about to cry as Ino brought the opening of her sandals over Ten Ten’s face forcing her to wear a mask she didn’t want to wear.

The weapons expert began sobbing as the odor of footsweat and leather hit her hard.

1553122212.title: Dawn vs. Maylene?

choices: She goes back to her Gym.
Dawn finds her at the field.
15531222121.content:
It was another normal day in Veilstone City. Business went about in the walled-in city, Reggie tended to his Pokemon, and the Veilstone Gym Leader was rather enjoying another tough training regiment with her Fighting-types in the open field nearby.

Maylene was training with her Lucario on hand-to-hand combat with her Meditite and Machoke training seperately from them, continuing to improve their strength and power to provide much more of a challenge to an outsider competing in the Sinnoh League. The sparing match between Meditite and Machoke came to a finish; the one between Maylene and Lucario had just gotten started.

"It's just as you wanted, Lucario!" Maylene yelled, sending a barrage of swift jabs at her eager Lucario.

Lucario growled in satisfaction from watching Maylene's performance in battles improve greatly since her match against Ash. Lucario knocked away her fists, throwing in his own punches.

Maylene backflipped away from him, turning on her foot against the bare grass and dirt and sending a rolling kick, to which Lucario grabbed. She gasped as Lucario flipped her off balance as he began a Bone Rush attack with his aura bone pole. Maylene quickly leapt off her hands, evading Lucario's strikes each time. Lucario then carelessly dove forward as she leapt high in the air.

"Gotcha!" Maylene exclaimed, extending her leg forward at the shocked Pokemon.

Lucario looked up; his face was at the receiving end of her dirt-stained foot. It did not take his aura senses to immediately see the fruits of Maylene's tough, physical labor from one foot. For a young girl her age, her soles were slightly roughened since she still considered hygiene to be important in everyday life. She hadn't washed or took care of her feet as of yet today as the potent aroma struck Lucario's gut harder than Machoke's punches.

Her youth provided much sweat to her healthy body, and her healthy feet were very smelly. Unfortunately for Lucario's sense of smell, Maylene's sole powdered in earthly dirt did not really help him at all.

"Rah," Lucario gasped, falling backwards onto the ground, struggling to breath after the risky encounter with Maylene's foot. Meditite and Machoke immediatle ran to his assistance. Maylene was flushed bright red in embarrassment.

"Oh, my gosh! I... I did not intend to beat you like that!" Maylene apologized. Lucario had passed out from the smell.

"Ohh," Lucario groaned.

"I may specialize in Fighting-type Pokemon, but I'm still a girl!" Maylened pouted, looking at her own two bare feet. "As cute as they look outside, they're cursed to be stinky after such hard battles, which is why I have Connelly hand out the Cobble Badge when battles get too rough... Ohh!"

Maylene ran off with her Pokemon dragging Lucario behind. That is until...
15531222121.title: Training Until...

choices: Dawn brushes off the smell, using her head to plan out revenge later.
Dawn takes down Maylene head-on in blind fury.
155312221212.content:
As with Lucario's unfortunate mishap, both Machoke and Meditite swiftly carried him off to the Pokemon Center to recover with Maylene suddenly behind them. This was only due to their driving motivation that if they were within two feet of Maylene's feet, then they would suffer Lucario's fate as well.

"Ma! Machoke!" Machoke shouted quickly, forcing it and Meditite to pick up the pace.

Maylene trailed behind, panting and fatigued from today's earlier training. She paused to catch her breath, only watching her only three Pokemon with her take off in a dusty flash into Veilstone City. Not even Reggie's Staraptor could match their speed when threatening motivation loomed in their minds...

"Wait! Slow down!" Maylene yelled, taking in short breaths. She knew their reason for fleeing, but she had no idea it was that dire. "Guys... I'd never do anything like that on purpose... I'm sorry..."

Maylene sat down on the grass, cross-legged. She was exhausted, not just from the training and sprinting, but she felt a bit downhearted about her poor foot hygiene.

"Hi, Maylene!" a perky voice shouted. Maylene did not flinch, too tired to even notice. She turned her hip and discovered Dawn standing behind her, alone and smiling.

"Dawn," she said, standing back on her feet to greet her with a friendly grin. "What brings you back here to Veilstone? And where are Ash and Brock?"

"Oh, they're at the Veilstone Pokemon Center! We're meeting Reggie about a situation between him and his rude brother, Paul," Dawn explain. Maylene frowned at the name of the latter.

"What is it this time with Paul?" Maylene asked, concerned. "I can tell it's up to no good if Paul's in a situation."

"That's what we're here for," Dawn replied. "You are over losing to him, right?" Maylene nodded, smiling innocently to show she had no problems. "Anyway, aside from that, I saw your Pokemon sprinting away from you towards the Pokemon Center. They looked scared..."

Maylene giggled sheepishly, slowly looking away in embarrassment.

"Well...," Maylene began, "Lucario and I were training as usual and... um, we had a little accident."

"Is Lucario alright?!" Dawn gasped.

"Eh! Don't worry!" Maylene assured, settling Dawn down. "Lucario had no injuries. It's just... something else." Maylene blushed bright red in mortification, unable to convey her smelly secret to Dawn.

"What is it?" Dawn asked kindly. "You can tell me. We're friends!" She was right. Maylene thought about it, hoping she would have nothing else left to lose by telling Dawn about her feet.

"Well, one indirect kick overwhelmed all of Lucario's senses," Maylene mumbled through her teeth, tapping her fingers together. Dawn was confused, tilting her head to the side.

"I'm sorry?" Dawn said, not havin understood properly. Maylene couldn't take it.

"Oh... Here!" Maylene cried, extending her leg up, her foot directed towards Dawn's face. Dawn stepped back on reflex from the false kick.

Dawn's eyes widened from both sight and smell. The bottoms of Maylene's sole and toes were slightly coated in earthly brown. Maylene's foot had a powerful scent of fresh dirt and sweat, strong enough to send signals to her brain that screamed "GET THE HELL AWAY FROM THAT STINKY FOOT!!!" Maylene's surprising secret knocked Dawn off her feet and onto her soft bottom.

"Oh! EWW!!" Dawn cried, rubbing her nostrils with her arm. Maylene retracted her foot back in shame. "What was that for?!"

"Sorry!" Maylene cried, cringing like a scared Growlithe.

Dawn realized her mistake of scolding, but something in her mind told her that she could not let Maylene get away with this. She could either remain cool or make Maylene pay for having been shown her smelly secret instead of simply using words. Maylene could have said something instead for a visual, or nasal, aid...
155312221212.title: Dawn's Discovery

choices: "I know! I'll make you smell my boots!"
"You can sniff my sweaty, filthy feet."
1553122212121.content:
"It's okay," Dawn said, wearing a false smile. She was going to get her revenge, and nothing was going to stop her. I'll wait until she's distracted before I make my move... Dawn thought.
"Sorry again..." Maylene whimpered.
"No, no, it's okay." Dawn replied, wiggling her sweaty toes underneath her pink, horrid-smelling boots. "I have to go to the bathroom, I'll be right back."
"There's one in the gym, it's the first door on your right..." Maylene muttered.
"Alright, thanks!" Dawn ran towards the gym, with an evil grin spread across her face. She pulled open the doors quietly, and began to survey the inside of the building. "Maylene is in for it big time... I don't think my feet have ever been this sweaty... Now, now, how to exact my vengence..." She said to herself. Dawn's face lit up as she noticed all those punching bags - each suspended by a long, thick rope. She pulled out her Pachirisu's Pokeball, and tossed it into the air.
"Pachi! Pachi!" The squirrel-like Pokemon exclaimed.
"Be quiet, Pachirisu! I need you to cut those ropes keeping the punching bags suspended in the air, okay?" Dawn whispered. The small Pokemon nodded its head happily, and went to work. In under ten minutes, Pachirisu had cut enough rope to fully bind a Machamp. "Thanks, Pachirisu!" Dawn smiled, recalling the Pokemon. She picked up all the thick thread, and bundled it in her backpack. Dawn strolled out of the building, and saw Maylene shuffling her feet with her back turned towards her-soon-to-be worst nightmare. Dawn crept up silently, pulling off her over-worn boot as she got closer. Before Maylene could say "Pichu!", Dawn had clamped the opening to her boot over Maylene's nose, and had secured it so well, that the barefoot fighting genius couldn't even manage to free herself the tiniest bit. Within moments, the pink haired girl had slipped into unconciousness.

Two hours later...
"Wh-where am I?" Maylene asked, fear running through her mind.
"You're where you're supposed to be, and where you will be for a long, long, time... MY FEET!" Dawn, who was standing barefoot, (her boots and socks in the corner). "Now, what to make you do first..."
1553122212121.title: A Nasty Plot

choices: Smell them for four, long, tedious hours.
15531222121212.content:
…You can sniff my sweaty, filthy feet.”
“W-what happened? Dawn! Why are you --- MPPPHHH!” Maylene was cut off by Dawn shoving her unwashed, sweat-stained, rancid sock into her mouth. The second the filthy sock touched Maylene’s tongue, the pink-haired girl began bucking wildly, trying to break free from the thick ropes tying her down. She began to attempt to spit out the nasty socks, but Dawn quickly stopped her from doing so by slamming her sweaty, dirty foot against her face.
“This is revenge, Maylene. It must really suck to be you right now, I haven’t washed my feet since I joined Ash on his journey. Oh! Let’s see how many steps I’ve taken…” Dawn taunted, pressing a few buttons on her Poketech. “OH MY GOD! NASTY! UGH! I’ve walked: 77,985,450 steps since I got this app! And, I haven’t changed my socks, boots, or even washed my feet since!”
Maylene, unable to talk, could only suck on the sweaty socks, and hope Dawn would change her mind. “Alright, let’s get on with it,” Dawn grinned, placing both of her bare feet over the poor girl’s face. The second Dawn’s feet reached within ten inches of Maylene’s face, a smell like none other the Gym leader had ever witnessed before overtook her senses. The smell was so vile, it was a stale, cheesy, vinegar-like scent that burned at the girl’s nose. Immediately the Gym Leader was forced into a fit of coughing.
“WHEW! My feet have NEVER smelled this bad before! I can smell them from here!” Dawn teased, waving her hand in front of her nose. Tears began to form in the corner of Maylene’s eyes. With a final try, Maylene managed to spit the rancid sock out onto the ground, and shake the pair of filthy feet off of her face.
“PLEASE! DAWN! NO MORE! PLEASE! I’M SORRY! I’LL DO ANYTHING, JUST PLEASE DON’T PUT THAT SOCK BACK! PLEASE!” Maylene screamed.
“Okay, I won’t,” Dawn replied, grabbing her other sock from inside of her sweat-soaked boots. “I’ll put this one in!” And, unfortunately for Maylene, Dawn was a lady of her word. The other sock went out, but another one went in, and this one was fresh and full of foot sweat. Dawn lifted her feet, and planted them right back on the girl’s face.
“I’ll give you a choice. You can sniff my feet as hard as you can and as fast as you can for twenty minutes, or you can sniff them for the next four hours. Now, for the first option, just sniff as deeply as you can. For the second, you can just nod your head, it’s your choice,” Dawn said happily.

15531222221122221.content:
Azula harshly glared at the blind earthbender, Toph. Both benders were panting hard. The harsh sun beat on their body. Their faces drenched in sweat, but neither wanted to lose the battle as their pride wouldn't allow it. So they just struggled and fought, until they both didn't have any fight in them left.

         “Looks like your friends left you here all alone, to be captured by me," Azula smugly told Toph. But Toph was hearing none of that.

         “If anything you're in a position." This intrigued Azula.

         “How so, oh wise blind prophet." Toph snickered a bit at her 'title'.

         “You are surrounded by earth of which I am a bender of." Toph told the fire princess. Azula snarled but then regained her composure.

         “Well to speed our little fight along. I propose a competition. If I win, which I'm sure I will, you willingly come along and be the fire nation's prisoner. However in the off chance I do lose, I'll stop chasing you and your gang forever. That means if I see you and your group doesn't engage first, I won't attack. Just pretend like I didn't see you. That seems like a fair competition to me. I'll even allow you chose what kind of competition we do." Azula grinned while telling Toph all this. Toph herself seemed to genuinely be thinking about the offer. She paced back and forth all the while taking quick glances at Azula.

         “You're on," Toph finally agreed. “The competition we will do is called Foot Smell," she shouted.

         Azula facepalmed. “What is that, you little brat." Toph then grinned at the poor poor Azula.

         “It's really simple. All we do is smell each other's feet and whomever loses consciousness first is the loser. Deal?" Toph explained. Azula was apprehensive to say the least, maybe not worried, because only the uninformed used that word, yet she had this gut feeling something was off. This wasn't the type of competition she was expecting but she couldn't back out now, she told Toph she could choose the competition. And anything less was disgraceful. And she was all about grace. “Deal."

Azula thought for sure she would win. Her feet were always extremely sweaty and stinky while inside her size 9 boots that she loved dearly. Her feet roasted not this boots. It didn't help that for the past hour her and Toph had been fighting in the blistering Sun. Even as they fought she could hear the audible squish of her feet. When she was younger she used to torture criminals and even Mai, Zuko, and Ty Lee. They would beg her to put her boots back on after training. Once she even made Zuko pass out by only passing her barefoot throughout his vicinity.

Likewise, Toph thought she would easily win this competition. She always walked around with nothing on her soles, so her soles were probably filthy, but Azula wouldn't know that until Toph pressed her soles against the fire princess's face. She smirked at that thought. She quickly remembered when she and Soka were out together and Soka had asked to rest for a bit. He had sat on the ground while Toph being an earthbender, made herself a chair to sit on, with a matching stool. Now Soka the ever curious one, decided to take it upon himself to sniff her feet. Well to say the least, he quickly passed out and Toph had to carry him all the way back to camp.

Now these two stench warriors, faced each other and sat down on the ground. Azula began to unbuckle her heavy combat boots, while Toph just waited. Once Azula finished a rancid smell filled the nearby area. Tooth could tell Azula's feet weren't just sweating. They were heavily damp. Droplets of stinky water poured off her feet. Azula sighed. “Its nice to take those off," as she wiggled her noxious toes.


Toph then her lifted feet up showing them off. Azula was visibly taken back. Toph's feet were covered in a heavy coat of dirt. Every adjective that could come to mind, dirty, grimy, filthy, and foul, did no true justice to what was before Azula. Not to mention, they had bugs on them. Azula couldn't believe her eyes. These feet were going to touch her face. Azula paled. Toph snickered knowing what was going through Azula's mind.

“You can give up now if you're not up to the challenge." Toph taunted.

Azula gritted her teeth. This would be a hard battle. “I would never give up to suck like you. " She defiantly roared back. “Oh well, I tried to save you from embarrassment." Toph responded. They then grew deadly silent.

Their feet rushed toward each other's face. Azula's sweaty feet versus Toph's dirty feet. Since Azula was a little taller, her feet touched Toph first. The smell assailed her nose. Burning her nose and lungs. Azula's humid feet kept Toph's face moist.

Toph's feet then reached Azula's face. Toph's feet carried the stench off 5 wet bison. And it slapped Azula around. Toph rubbed her feet into Azula's face smearing it with dirt and bugs. It poisoned her whole body.

This carries on until....

15531222221122222112112.content:
It had been difficult work, investigating spiritual anomalies East of Republic City, but Korra strode into the office of her friend, Asami Sato with a satisfied smile. Taking off a heavy coat, she tapped a bit of soil from her boots before she scanned the office around her, finding Asami sitting at a small desk at the far end of the room. Her head seemed to drop as the door closed behind Korra, and the Avatar gave a small, curious cock of the head, uncertain if she was hiding from someone or not.
"Asami? Working late, I see?" she spoke boldly, uncertain if she was heard.
Asami was always jealous of Korra since their meeting. The Avatar commanded such respect and power, and being a non-bender herself, she always chaffed at toiling in the shadow of her more capable partner. But for many weeks now, Asami had been scheming of a way to gain the upper-hand over Korra, and knowing the girl's hatred for foot odor and feet generally, she hoped to end the rivalry with Korra once and for all tonight. Putting on a gentle smile, she craned her neck to her friend, speaking softly.
"Only a little...I think I'm just about finished here," Asami spoke with a small smile, nodding a bit as she put her pencil down on the desk. Korra seemed to ignore her as she walked around the office, toying with baubles and looking through papers. Asami narrowed her eyes at the girl's disinterest and cleared her throat to speak once more.
"Korra? Could you help me with something? I think I may have twisted my ankle..." Asami spoke with a wince, rubbing her fake injury. "I heard you water-benders have a way with circulation...I know it's a lot to ask, but could you just take a look?"
Korra's lips creased as she looked over at Asami. 'Ugh...feet...' she muttered. Swallowing audibly, she nonetheless put on a jovial expression, striding over confidently. "Well, I don't know much, but I suppose I can have a look..."
Asami began to unbutton her spats lovingly before she slide them and her short boot from her foot. As Korra approached, Asami already saw the rather unpleasant expression gracing her 'friend's' face. Blinking innocently as the last of the boot slide across her red-painted toe nails, she gave Korra a slight nod.
"Sorry about this...and the smell...girl has to make a living and I don't think the people here would appreciate me walking barefoot. But I appreciate you doing this, Korra..." she spoke almost cooing to Korra as she hoisted her foot up slightly, wiggling her toes almost involuntarily. Korra looked around the room, ensuring she wouldn't be spied upon by an other co-workers before kneeling down next to Asami's foot and taking the soft thing into her hand.

155312222211222222111.content:
Nobody knew what to expect when Master Katara accidentally fell into the Spirit Oasis on a trip to the Northern Water Tribe. Least of all did anyone expect the eighty-four year old woman to become fourteen years old again. Avatar Korra was shocked by the news but after a talk with the spirit of Avatar Aang,she learned that effect would only last three months and Katara would revert to normal soon after. Katara herself however,was thrilled!

She had never had a real childhood growing up,having been forced to perform the tasks of her deceased mother while her brother goofed off all day. The fact that she then had to fight a war didn't help. Now that she had her youth back, Katara was going to live it up. She spent the next two months in Republic City with Korra,hanging out,pulling pranks, and playing with her grandkids in ways she never could.

One night, she and Korra were in the middle of a game of Dare, trying to top each other in crazy challenges. Both girls were deep in thought over something that would cause the other to give up and win the game for them. After about an hour, they each had an idea they were sure would terrify the other. "I DARE YOU TO SMELL MY FEET!!!" Both girls realized they had said the exact same thing and burst out laughing. "Come on Katara, give me a challenge at least. Your feet will be no problem for me."

Katara stopped laughing. "Hey, I'll have you know my feet are pretty nasty, even worse than my brother's and that's saying something!" Korra frowned. "Come on Katara, everyone knows I have the stinkiest,nastiest feet in the whole Water Tribe."

"Ha! Your feet are nothing compared to mine!" Katara scoffed. "Is that a challenge?" "What if it is?"

Korra sneered. "Fine, in one week,we have a smelly feet contest. You can use the use the time to stink up your feet and whoever passed out first loses!" "Deal" Katara said with a glare.

1553122222112222221222222211.content:
It was a few months after the Equalist Invasion when it happened. Master Katara was visiting the Northern Water Tribe on request from a friend when she accidentally fell in the mystical Spirit Oasis. Everyone knew the water had magical properties but no one had suspected that the eighty- four year old woman would be turned back into a fourteen year old girl, the same age she had been during the Hundred Year War!

Chief Unlaq summoned Avatar Korra,his neice, up North when he learned the news. Korra was shocked but after conferring with the spirit of Avatar Aang, Katara's late husband, she learned the effect was only temporary and would only last another month at most. Katara would just have to deal with it until then.

The master water bender was thrilled with the turn of events however. She had never had a real childhood growing up and planned to spend the next month making up for lost time. The Order of the White Lotus had other plans however. They believed Katara was too vulnerable in her now youthful form and made plans to "keep her safe" like they had with Korra by locking her in the second compound they had created just in case Aang's successor was born in the Northern Tribe. Katara was forced to comply but Korra agreed to serve out the exile with her mentor and friend to keep her company. This had all been a week ago and the two had spent their time sparring, hanging out,goofing off, and playing pranks on the sentries assigned to guard them.

"Nice match Korra" a sweaty Katara told her former pupil as they completed their latest spar "you can certainly still give me a workout." "You too" an equally sweaty Avatar complimented "your water bending is strong as ever. What do you want to do now?" Katara thought for a moment. They weren't allowed to leave the compound for even a moment and security was too tight to try sneaking out. "Want to see who can eat the most sea prunes?" "Ugh, those things are gross! How about a belching contest?" "Definitely" Katara chuckled "but not right now. I want to do something wild and wacky, something so crazy nobody will belive I did it."

Korra thought for a moment then a smirk crossed her face. "Okay then, I challenge you to a smelly feet contest. Whoever passes out first loses". Katara stared blankly at the Avatar for a moment then burst out laughing. "Oh man, that's perfect! Whoever wins will have the undisputed smelliest feet in all the Water Tribes! Just try not to take losing too hard."

Korra scoffed. "Dream on old lady!" "I'm younger than you now, whipper snapper. How do we do this?

155312222211222222211.content:
Note: This takes place shortly before the series starts, a couple weeks before Aang is found.

Katara groaned as she started on yet another load of dirty laundry for her village. She disliked doing chores at all but this had always been her least favorite. She leaned in close to the load and caught a nasty whiff of her brother's socks. The smell was so strong it made her eyes water! "Stupid Sokka" she muttered under her breath as she held her nose with one hand and picked up a sock with the other "it isn't fair! He gets to pretend he's a soldier all day and boss people around while I do all the work and have to smell his gross socks every day!"

Time and time again, Katara had fantasised about so much more than her boring, no fun life in the village. She dreamed of mastering water bending and kicking Fire Nation butt, of saving the world alongside the long lost avatar. But, as her stupid older brother often said, it would never happen.

"He doesn't even care how hard I work" she grumbled as she bent water out of stream she stood over to wash the sock "it's all just 'girls' work' to him. I bet he'd see thing differently if he were in place! I'd love to give him a big whiff of my-" Katara stopped short of her sentence as an idea struck her. She sat down and began working one of her boots off, peeling off a sweaty sock soon after. She tentatively took a sniff and retched at the smell. Slowly but surely, a a grin of pure mischief spread across her face. A plan was slowly being set in motion...

choices: She beckons Dennis to come close.
15531222221212211112222211.content:
It was another mediocre, but still spooky day at Hotel Transylvania. Mavis Dracula and her small family had decided to stay for a while with no particular direction in traveling as of yet. That is something they wanted to figure out in order to move on from here. Somehow, Mavis was left in her room with her only and little son, Dennis. Her husband, Johnny, was off doing his own thing. The rest of her family was busy entertaining various monsters and human guests.

Of course, she didn't really mind being alone with her son. Far from it.

She loved Dennis and only wants what is best for him. Even though he had shown his hidden vampiric abilities that he inherited from her side of the family, he still kept his adorable human form most of the time. Even that little werewolf girl, Winnie, is still fond of him.

How cute.

Mavis couldn't help but feel a little proud that her son was already attracting members of the opposite gender, in regards to those close to his age. Of course, he would need to be steered in the right direction as to have him not take advantage of girls' emotions, but that would be a talk for many years to come. And certainly, a lot can happen by then.

Moving the story along, she sat in a comfy chair while watching Dennis entertain himself with typical human toys. At the meantime, she amused herself with a smartphone, a gift from her parents-in-law. She didn't mind having to get on with the times and found the Internet to be quite the wondrous landscape despite having learned through it that her father nearly endangered her son's life. She even found a site where people around the world upload random videos. At this time, she had decided to look up videos that depicted activities between mothers and sons, hoping to find additional ideas to spend time with Dennis while Johnny was out.

A few videos that were at the top of her search were titled similarly as "Getting My Son to Smell Mommy's Stinky Feet." At first glance, she was a bit appalled at the idea that mothers were making their children smell their stinky feet. She wanted to get off the page and rid herself of such perverse thoughts, but she still couldn't help but wonder what did go on in those videos. Clicking on one of them, Mavis found that it was not as bad as she originally perceived. There was much laughter between the participants, including the cameraman who happened to be the father. The child in the video did not appear any older than Dennis. The mother in the video just made playful noises while placing her feet by her little son's face, who doesn't seem to know any better and still continued sniffing her toes.

Mavis wasn't sure what to think right now.

Part of her was tempted to try this out with Dennis now. But would he be willing to go through with it? If Johnny were to find out, what would he think? What about the rest of her family and their friends? And especially, did her feet have a strong and possible unpleasant scent?

She looked down from her chair. She only had her striped tights on, no Converses. They were actually at the side of her chair. She noted that she had those shoes nearly forever despite them still appearing in good condition.

Do they also smell? Mavis pondered.

She flexed her toes and saw them stretch out a bit. Mavis could feel that her feet were particularly warm and slightly wet from her own sweat, only because she had those tights on for a long time. She then wondered when was the last time she also washed them. She moved those thoughts to the side to see Dennis still preoccupied with his toys.

Well, it was time to test out these human activities.
15531222221212211112222211.title: Bored Mavis

There ya go, slobs! Pick her or get out! I'll figure out an opponent for her once you pick her, otherwise scram!
155322222.title: MAKE UP YOUR MIND!

choices: Have the Koopa judge their feet.
Take turns smelling the other's feet. First one to pass out loses!
1553222221.content:
In the Koopa Kingdom, where good is bad and ugly is cute, Princess Wendy is the most beautiful thing in the world. From her fat little potbelly to her slimy lips and nasty smile(not to mention her breath) she was the object of everyone's desire. But by far the most beautiful thing about her was her utterly cheesy, smelly feet. They stunk so bad that even fans of foul feet thought they were too much. But she loved it. Every time she was sad or angry she'd take a whiff of the vinegary scent that wafted off her footsoles and smiled. Nobody could compete with her feet.

Or so she thought.

"Hey loser!" She barked, looking up from her magazine. She was getting a talon sharpening on her toes by one of her faithful koopa servants, but the poor koopa could barely stay conscious from the stink wafting off her feet. She wiggled her toes and poked him in the eye with a pointy claw to make sure he stayed focused, "You be careful down there. Don't you nick my feet or my daddy will bite your head right off! You hear me! You're dealing with the best feet in all of the Koopa Kingdom, you treat them with respect!"

The koopa weakly nodded and tried not to throw up. The workers at "La Fromage" foot spa were used to rotten and smelly toes, but even their most experienced workers dreaded when Wendy showed up for a talon polishing.

"Weh weh weh weh!"

"Huh?" Wendy looked up from her magazine again. It was Birdo, the local fashion queen, no doubt her for a foot scrubbing herself. She was notoriously "beautiful" around the koopas and her foot odor was something to behold. Some rumored it was even as foul as Wendy's. Of course WENDY would make anyone who said that lick her toejam if she heard them saying that.

"Aren't you cute?" Birdo said, covering her snout in a ladylike way as she laughed, "Best feet? Is that what you think? You really shouldn't talk so big, especially when you're in the presence of the kingdom's REAL best feet."

Birdo put up her feet next to Wendy's to show off how filthy and smelly they were. The poor Koopa pedicurist was so overwhelmed by the combination of smells that he passed right out. Wendy was steaming now, her face glowing red. She tore her magazine in half and leaped up from her seat.

"Y-you CHARLETON! How dare you walk in and talk about your stupid, ugly, PINK feet like they're better than mine? You looking for a fight?!? Huh?!?!"

"Weh weh weh weh!" Birdo laughed her nasty laugh again, "I think that's exactly what I'm looking for Darling! If your feet are so rotten, why not wager against mine? The loser has to lick the winner's soles!"

"Sure, I'll wager against you, but when you lose you won't just lick my soles! You'll lick my soles, tongue clean every sock I wear AND tell the entire Kingdom how much you love the smell and taste of my putrid feet!"

"Weh weh! And when I win you'll do the exact same for me!"

"DEAL! So how're we gonna do this?"
1553222221.title: The Cheesiest Toes in the Koopa Kingdom!

15532222211.content:
Hours later, that poor koopa who had been knocked out from the rotten odors of Wendy and Birdo's feet awoke to the all too familiar smell of cheese popcorn and vinegar. "Oh no", he thought, and when he snapped his eyes open his fears were confirmed: Two pairs of feet were sitting in front of him, one pair pink and the other orange, both of them scaly and disgustingly stinky. He was about to cry from sheer misery.

"Hey! He's up!" Wendy said.

"I can see that, darling," Added Birdo, "Hello sweetie! I bet you're wondering where you are."

The koopa looked around him: stone walls, torches, chains and his body seemed to be hooked in a floor-level stockade. He was in one of Bowser's dungeons! He struggled, but he knew that there would be no escape until he was released by these awful, stinkfooted women. And that would only be once they had completely annihilated his nostrils.

"P-please" He started to say, but Wendy cut him off,

"Listen up, sniveling slave! Here's what you're gonna do: You're gonna sit there like a good loser and sniff both our feet and decide which one of us is the stinkiest. Of course, that's gonna be me, but you're gonna humor this ugly hag and make her feel good before you shatter her dreams and tell her that I'm the prettiest with the smelliest feet!"

"And," Birdo chimed in, "You're going to wear this blindfold," She wrapped a cloth blindfold around his face, "so that way you can't play favorites and you have to pick honestly."

"Heh, as if that matters."

"Oh? How confident are you in that?"

"What're you implying?"

"Well, how about this, to make it even MORE interesting? The winner gets to keep this koopa as a slave!"

"PFft, you'd have to force people to smell your LOSER toes. You're on!"

The koopa quivered as he felt a pair of warm toes come near his snout. He tried to hold his breath, but the tips of those scaly feet tickled under his chin and he sniffed inward. Instantly, he was blasted with the rotten stink of...
15532222211.title: An Unwilling Participant

choices: Wendy's! Birdo gets to sniff koopa feet!
Birdo's! Wendy better get her nose ready!
15532222212.content:
Wendy nodded in agreement, "Yeah, I think that's pretty fair. Only people with a REALLY rotten footsmell could appreciate the stench of another. Not that I'm saying you're even within a billion leagues of my league when it comes to stenchiness. I'm just saying you're almost not awful."

"Why thank you Wendy," Birdo sneered, "I'd say we don't have much of another choice given our friend here fainted within seconds of being near my fabulous pink soles. We'd have to pit our hardened sinuses against one another to get anywhere."

Birdo playfully slapped the unconscious koopa with her slimy, sticky soles and watched him recoil in olfactory agony. Then, she nodded to Wendy and the two went to the back rooms. There were several massage rooms back there that were perfect for privacy needs, so the two merely found an unoccupied one and locked the door behind them. The massage room had dimmed lighting and a large chair for getting foot massages, perfect for their contest.

"So, how do we decide who has to sniff first?" Birdo asked, "Perhaps we flip a coin?"

"NO! You keep your ugly hands off my precious coins!" Wendy shouted. She scanned the room for something suitable and smiled when she found something. She pulled two large scented candles off the shelf and lit them with a bit of her own firebreath.

"Here! We'll use these. We put our feet over the candles and let them get us sweating! The first person to put our their candle with their feet drippings win! Loser starts us off and sniffs for the first five minutes!"

"Hmm, sounds fair."

And the two sat on the floor, carefully holding their feet over the candles. As their sweat built up, so did their foot odor, until the candles were completely overpowered and the room stank of feet. Their soles dripped and dripped, but eventually the first candle to go out was...
15532222212.title: Nose to nose

choices: Wendy easily gets through her five minutes. It’s Birdo’s turn now!
Wendy can’t take what she can dish out and passes out!
155322222122.content:
Birdo’s candle was the first to be extinguished by her rancid foot sweat eliciting a confident and haughty giggle from the pink Dinosaur.

“Weh Weh Weh! Too bad for you Koopa Princess, guess you’re going to have to smell my beautiful and rancid feet!”

“Hmph. All this is doing is delaying the inevitable. I’ll be able to take your feet’s weak stench and then you’ll fall to my powerful and lovely aroma!” Birdo just laughed as she sat in the large massage chair, propping up her slimy and stinky soles.

“Yeah yeah. How about you stop talking Ms. Puffy Lips and start smelling these lovely pink soles of mine! Now let me tell you that I haven’t washed this things in a while!”

“Shut up! It’s only five minutes anyway! That’s practically nothing! You just make sure to keep your eyes on the clock sister!” Birdo nodded.

“Oh don’t worry, I will. But if you’ll last that thing is the real question. Now get to it Wendy!”

Wendy let out an annoyed sigh as she bent down and got close to Birdo’s sticky and sweaty feet. The Koopaling’s sinuses were immediately assaulted by the overpowering stench of Birdo’s feet which once again caused the pink gal to giggle and playfully giggle her toejam filled toes.

“What’s wrong Wendy! Don’t tell me you’re going to pass out already?”

“Shut your hole! I’m already used to this weak stench! Just keep your eyes on that clock! 5 minutes on the dot!”

“Yeah, yeah just keep smelling.” Wendy continued smelling Birdo’s foot as she tried her best to not show how awful the entire thing was.

This smells like rotten eggs and cabbages! Nngh...this is nearly as powerful as my feet! Birdo continued giggling her toes and wrinkling her soles as Wendy continued to take deep sniffs of Birdo’s feet.

“4 more minutes.”

Only a minute has passed! Oh King Bowser give me strength... Wendy continued sniffing as she desperately tried to cling to consciousness, her own feet starting to tremble in weakness. Wendy had to overcome this horrible cheesy stench. She couldn’t let herself be beaten by this Pink Wannabe Fashionista! Wendy continued sniffing and...

info.description:
This is a competition of anime and videogame characters where the smelliest feet collide! The use of feet, and shoes, socks, and all kinds of footwear are allowed. The first one to get knocked out or submit loses the fight!

Again, it is quality controlled, so have fun everyone!

(PS: Creativity is highly encouraged!)
